com.greenfabric.system
Interface OSInfo

All Known Implementing Classes:
UnixInfo, WindowsInfo
public interface OSInfo

This interface specifies the services that Operating System specific adapters must implement.

This interface is a work in progress.

Author:
Robb Shecter, robb@acm.org

Method Summary
 boolean isSymLink(java.io.File aFile)
          Tests for symbolic links in what could be an OS-dependent way.
 boolean supportsSymLinks()
           
 

Method Detail

isSymLink

public boolean isSymLink(java.io.File aFile)
                  throws java.io.IOException
Tests for symbolic links in what could be an OS-dependent way.

Returns:
true if the file is a symbolic link or false if it isn't, or if the current OS doesn't support symbolic links.
Throws:
java.io.IOException - if there was an error accesing the filesystem.

supportsSymLinks

public boolean supportsSymLinks()
Returns:
true if the OS I represent supports the concept of symbolic links and allows them to be tested from Java.
